outputs.output_descr: This proposed project responds to the first and fourth priorities of CDAP, i.e.: (1st) Trained and skilled manpower for sustainable environmental governance in place and (4th) Promotion of education, training and public awareness. Moreover, the CDAP strongly recommends an approach to capacity development through existing national training institutes, this project implements that recommended approach.

project_descr: National capacity Development for Implementing Rio Conventions thorugh Environmental Governance.
project_title: National Capacity Development for Implementing Rio Conve
